string.value: #b#eTitle Challenge - Pink Bean Slayer#n(Special Title)\n#k#e#bPink Bean Slayer#k#n, the title given to the person who slays the most Pink Beans! Dalair said that if I hunt a Pink Bean but don't report it to him, it won't count.

#b#eTitle Challenge - Pink Bean Slayer#n(Special Title)
#k
 - Pink Bean Hunting Record that Dalair knows about : #r#jmon##k 

The person who reports the most Pink Beans hunted to Dalair will receive this title. But, if I give up, I'll have to start all over from zero next time!

#b#eTitle Challenge - Pink Bean Slayer#n(Special Title)
#k
 - Pink Bean Hunting Record that Dalair knows about : #r#jmon##k 

The honorable '#bPink Bean Slayer#k' title is given to the one person who slays the most Pink Beans.

#i1140003##e#b#t1140003##k

#nRaise Popularity by 20,000 


Do you want to test your skills to see if you're worthy of this title?
I wish you the best. There isn't a specific time limit, so whenever you think you're ready, come back and see me.
Only one person who hunts the most Pink Beans can be the owner of this title.
